languages.text: "Так что давайте, молитесь за упокой души Беллардо. Скоро его заберет пламя. Хороший конец для такой жизни. Храни его душу Император!" {n}Не произнося больше ни слова, Капеллан творит знак {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g} и показательно отворачивается от гостей.{/n}

"So go ahead, pray for Bellardo's soul. Soon the flames will take him. A fitting end for a life like his. May the Emperor keep his soul!" {n}Without another word, Chaplain makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} and pointedly turns away from the attendees.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так что давайте, молитесь за упокой души Беллардо. Скоро его заберет пламя. Хороший конец для такой жизни. Храни его душу Император!" {n}Не произнося больше ни слова, Капеллан творит знак {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g} и показательно отворачивается от гостей.{/n}

traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

traits.locale_text: "So go ahead, pray for Bellardo's soul. Soon the flames will take him. A fitting end for a life like his. May the Emperor keep his soul!" {n}Without another word, Chaplain makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} and pointedly turns away from the attendees.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: “继续吧，为贝拉多的灵魂祈祷。用不了多久，火焰就会净化他。对他这样的人来说，这样的结局挺合适的。愿帝皇保佑他的灵魂！”{n}牧师比了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}的手势，没有再说什么，随后便有意转过了身。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So go ahead, pray for Bellardo's soul. Soon the flames will take him. A fitting end for a life like his. May the Emperor keep his soul!" {n}Without another word, Chaplain makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} and pointedly turns away from the attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “继续吧，为贝拉多的灵魂祈祷。用不了多久，火焰就会净化他。对他这样的人来说，这样的结局挺合适的。愿帝皇保佑他的灵魂！”{n}牧师比了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}的手势，没有再说什么，随后便有意转过了身。{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: «De modo que podéis rezar por el alma de Bellardo. Pronto se lo llevarán las llamas; un final muy apropiado para una vida como la suya. ¡Que el Emperador guarde su alma!». {n}Sin añadir nada más, Capellán hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} y da la espalda a los asistentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So go ahead, pray for Bellardo's soul. Soon the flames will take him. A fitting end for a life like his. May the Emperor keep his soul!" {n}Without another word, Chaplain makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} and pointedly turns away from the attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «De modo que podéis rezar por el alma de Bellardo. Pronto se lo llevarán las llamas; un final muy apropiado para una vida como la suya. ¡Que el Emperador guarde su alma!». {n}Sin añadir nada más, Capellán hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} y da la espalda a los asistentes.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: 「さあ、共にベラルドの魂のために祈ろう。やがて炎が彼をさらう。皇帝よ、彼の魂をお守りください！」{n}教戒官はそれ以上何も言わず、{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を描き、素早く参加者から目を離した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So go ahead, pray for Bellardo's soul. Soon the flames will take him. A fitting end for a life like his. May the Emperor keep his soul!" {n}Without another word, Chaplain makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} and pointedly turns away from the attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、共にベラルドの魂のために祈ろう。やがて炎が彼をさらう。皇帝よ、彼の魂をお守りください！」{n}教戒官はそれ以上何も言わず、{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を描き、素早く参加者から目を離した。{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: "Nur zu, betet für Bellardos Seele. Bald werden die Flammen ihn zu sich holen. Ein passendes Ende für ein Leben wie das seine. Möge der Imperator seine Seele behüten!" {n}Ohne ein weiteres Wort macht Ordenspriester das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g} und wendet sich demonstrativ von den Anwesenden ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So go ahead, pray for Bellardo's soul. Soon the flames will take him. A fitting end for a life like his. May the Emperor keep his soul!" {n}Without another word, Chaplain makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} and pointedly turns away from the attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nur zu, betet für Bellardos Seele. Bald werden die Flammen ihn zu sich holen. Ein passendes Ende für ein Leben wie das seine. Möge der Imperator seine Seele behüten!" {n}Ohne ein weiteres Wort macht Ordenspriester das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g} und wendet sich demonstrativ von den Anwesenden ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: « Alors, allez-y, priez pour l'âme de Bellardo. Bientôt, les flammes le consumeront. Une juste rétribution pour la vie qu'il a menée. Que l'Empereur garde son âme ! » {n}Sans un mot de plus, Chapelain fait le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} et tourne ostensiblement le dos aux invités.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So go ahead, pray for Bellardo's soul. Soon the flames will take him. A fitting end for a life like his. May the Emperor keep his soul!" {n}Without another word, Chaplain makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} and pointedly turns away from the attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Alors, allez-y, priez pour l'âme de Bellardo. Bientôt, les flammes le consumeront. Une juste rétribution pour la vie qu'il a menée. Que l'Empereur garde son âme ! » {n}Sans un mot de plus, Chapelain fait le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} et tourne ostensiblement le dos aux invités.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: "Buyurun, Bellardo'nun ruhu için dua edin. Yakında alevlere teslim olacak. Sürdüğü hayata layık bir son. İmparator, ruhunu korusun!" {n}Papaz, başka bir şey demeden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapıp davetlilere posta koyarcasına sırtını dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So go ahead, pray for Bellardo's soul. Soon the flames will take him. A fitting end for a life like his. May the Emperor keep his soul!" {n}Without another word, Chaplain makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} and pointedly turns away from the attendees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Buyurun, Bellardo'nun ruhu için dua edin. Yakında alevlere teslim olacak. Böyle bir hayatın layık olduğu son budur. İmparator ruhunu korusun!" {n}Papaz başka bir söz söylemeden {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapıp davetlilere hırsla arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain
